Various Otyebis Crewmen:





Hugar's transmission was received and a random person responded as he 
entered him into the Regular League.

"Thank you, Hugar, for entering the IGL Regular League.  There will 
be a two week time period for less prompt beings to enter into the 
leagues, until then I suggest you train.  Good luck."
